::Zardus/Bloodystrike::

Zardus frowns as Skulletron goes unconscious in front of him. He taps his 
comm-link.

"Bloodystrike," he says into it, glancing to make sure that the bot was 
inside the base, "Could you report to the conference room?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Several feet into the base, Bloodystrike recieves Zardus' transmission, 
changing course for the conference room. He enters, nearly tripping over 
Skilletron.

"What do you want?"

Zardus looks at him, sitting down again. "Take him to the CR room. Disarm him 
and get him repaired. Then see what he wants. If he joins, send him to me."

Bloodystrike, nods, picking up Skulletron and walking out of the room, 
locking the door behind him.

Zardus turns back to Soundwave. "If this peace is achieved, what is Voluis 
planning to do?"
